name: Crystal Locks
description:
In the freezing mountains, there's an ancient structure in a cave powered by crystal energy. Legend has it wizards of Barzu had made this structure to seal away a magic scroll as it was too dangerous for any mortal to use. The wizards made it so that only their powers can move the crystal energy around. 

However, there comes a rogue wizard who seeks the scroll and will solve the many crystal locks that will stand in his way. 

This game was made for the Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022, we hope you guys enjoy!

Gameplay

A puzzle theme game that requires only your mouse to play! The player has to click on the crystals and other objects to guide the beams into the color locks. There are 9 levels in total with new mechanics being introduced along the way!
